title: Snowday Malzahar Poro Bug.
body: When playing as Snowday Malzahar and you recall, the Poro that appears during the recall is pure blue. In a game today I asked my teammates and the enemy team if they see it and they all said that the Poro during his recall appeared blue on their screen too.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix - appears to be a missing texture.
Thanks for the reply. Now I won't be so blue. :P
I saw that too during my games yesterday. Wasn't sure if it was a bug or i just never noticed it lol.
